version_description:
- iCloud is now supported. You can view and edit your documents stored on iCloud for free.
- You can change the document background color.
- Improved the user interface to allow users to send documents via email or messenger more easily.
- Added a new in-app purchase product($1.99) that allows users to use Polaris Office without ads on iPhones and iPads.
- 3D Touch is now supported.
: You can open recent documents directly from the app launcher icon.
: While editing your document, you can preview an image or video and then insert it into your document.
- Improved the user interface to allow users to use the File Browser menu more easily.
- Fixed other bugs to help you enjoy our product without any inconveniences.

- (Paid) You can convert PDF documents to WORD, SHEET, or SLIDE documents and edit them.  
- You can preview documents in the Home, Search, and External Clouds screens using 3D Touch.
- You can print TEXT documents.
- You can directly share your documents in the document editor or on social media.
- Fixed other bugs to help you enjoy our product without any inconveniences.

- Improved the writing experience for annotating on PDF documents.
- Only unlocked cells can be edited in a protected worksheet.
- Fixed other bugs to help You enjoy our product without any inconveniences.
- Fixed other bugs to help You enjoy our product without any inconveniences.
- Fixed other bugs to help You enjoy our product without any inconveniences.
- Fixed other bugs to help You enjoy our product without any inconveniences.

- Provides additional Bluetooth keyboard shortcut keys.
- Improved document screen for when switching edit mode between view mode.
- Improved that the width of the tab is changed according to the sheet tab name in the sheet.
- Fixed bugs so that is convenient to use as usual.
- Fixed bugs so that is convenient to use as usual.

- Added Bluetooth keyboard function and improved stability.
- Improved switching between document view mode and edit mode.
- Width of sheet tab has been improved to fit according to the tab title.
- Fixed a bug that could terminate unexpectedly when viewing a sheet document.
- Fixed other bugs to help You enjoy our product without any inconveniences.
- Fixed a bug that some languages were not entered correctly when editing documents.

- Resolved saving-error problem that occasionally occurred on above iOS 10.3.
- Fixed other bugs to help You enjoy our product without any inconveniences.

- You can get a Free PDF Export if you watch a rewarded advertisement. (* Some countries are not supported)
- Occasional Insert Row Error has been fixed in Excel documents.
- Occasional Error that occurred when saving to Cloud Storage has been fixed.
- Occasional Change Font issue has been fixed.
- Fixed other bugs to help You enjoy our product without any inconveniences.

- You can get a Free PDF Export if you watch a rewarded advertisement. (* Some countries are not supported)
- Occasional Insert Row Error has been fixed in Excel documents.
- Occasional Error that occurred when saving to Cloud Storage has been fixed.
- Occasional Change Font issue has been fixed.
- Fixed other bugs to help You enjoy our product without any inconveniences.

- Folder Not Found Error that occured when you changed folder name on Cloud Storage has been fixed.
- Fixed other bugs to help You enjoy our product without any inconveniences.

- Fixed Limitless loading error after applying encoding to a text document.
- Fixed unusual output of some formula that are inserted to SLIDE document.
- Fixed save error in WebDAV.
- Fixed other bugs to help You enjoy our product without any inconveniences.

- Fixed the issue get smaller letters on Slide document.
- Fixed the issue the note disappeared after Slide note is inserted.
- Improved the function of keyboard output when Slide note is inserted.
- Fixed other bugs to help You enjoy our product without any inconveniences.

- Able to inactive the sound volume of media Ads on the setting.
- Fixed the problem of overlapping characters in slide document.
- Fixed the issue where bookmarks were not saved.
- Fixed the issue that the arrow keys of Apple Smart Keyboard doesn't work when scrolling in full screen view mode.
- You can move pages by using 'cmd + shift + an arrow key' of Apple Smart Keyboard in Slide and PDF document.
- Fixed other issues that we found from customer reviews and inquiries.

- Improved the performance of opening PDF file.
- Fixed other issues that we found from customer reviews and inquiries.

- iPhone X is now supported. You can view and edit documents on iPhone X for free.
- Improved the performance for viewing and editing documents.
- Fixed the occasional error which is occurred when saving a Sheet document.
- Fixed the error that the text copied in a document is not pasted on SNS or a text message.
- Fixed other issues that we found from customer reviews and inquiries.

- Able to use "Lock apps" function for free. Use this function through password and fingerprint.
- Fixed the error that keyboard input is slowing down when setting shortcut key.
- Fixed the error that original filter is removed when applying the filter to a new column.
- Fixed other issues that we found from customer reviews and inquiries.

- Improved keystroke usability for editing documents smoothly in iPhone/iPad.
- Fixed other issues that we found from customer reviews and inquiries.

- Improved keystroke usability for editing documents smoothly in iPhone/iPad.
- Fixed other issues that we found from customer reviews and inquiries.

- Fixed the issue that Russian language is outputted incorrectly.
- Fixed other issues that we found from customer reviews and inquiries.

- Fixed issue that cannot be edit chart data on Slide document.
- Fixed other issues that we found from customer reviews and inquiries.

- Fixed the error that the app is intermittently closed on iOS 8.
- Fixed other bugs to help You enjoy our product without any inconveniences.

- PDF document's icon is changed.
- Fixed the error that app is closed when inserting a picture on a document.
- Fixed other issues that we found from customer reviews and inquiries.

In this version,
- Improved stability of object editing on Sheet document.
- Improved the stability of saving.
- Improved the notice sentence for customers to set the password without problem.
- Fixed other issues that we found from customer reviews and inquiries.

Polaris Office regards customers feedback as important!
Please give us your opinion for us to provide you better service.

In this version,
- The stability of editing and saving is drastically advanced by applying the latest office engine.
- Fixed the error that some documents are not opened in Safari app.
- Fixed the error that consonants are typed twice in 10 key keyboard.
- The words that can be changed at one time are drastically increased when using Replace All function.
- Fixed the error that some contents are deleted when using Delete key.
- Fixed the error that some formulas don't appear in Slide document.
- Able to view and edit .hwp format's document.
- Fixed other issues and improved the usability that we received from customer reviews and inquiries.
